name: places/ChIJb6IqI7lZwokRK7373J7BAp0
adrFormatAddress: 150 9th Ave, New York, NY 10011-4904, USA

originalText.text: I am very happy with the service at Yau's Excellent Cleaners. It is not very expensive, and the service is efficient and professional. The man who works in the shop is very friendly at all times! If you live in/near Chelsea - definitely try this dry cleaning!

text.text: I am very happy with the service at Yau's Excellent Cleaners. It is not very expensive, and the service is efficient and professional. The man who works in the shop is very friendly at all times! If you live in/near Chelsea - definitely try this dry cleaning!

originalText.text: I used this place since 1977. It was always reliable but since my favorite guy there passed away a couple of years ago they have gone down hill. Now the old guy who barely speaks English (or who pretends to barely speak English) is downright nasty. He refuses to fold and box my shirts anymore saying the "company" will only put them on hangers. I'm looking for a shop to do what I want and not what the "company" wants. He can go to blazes, I'll not use them anymore

originalText.text: The man at the front desk is incompetent and attempts to play stupid when there are issues. After having an extensive talk to him for a second time, I left the store, closed my eyes and walked into oncoming traffic on 9th. I’ve never been so frustrated in my life. Go somewhere else before that guy tries to end your life.

originalText.text: I've been using Yau's to do laundry for my orthopedic massage therapy practice a few blocks away. They sometimes take a little time to come, but they've gotten better in recent months. I can always rely on them to do the job right!

text.text: I've been using Yau's to do laundry for my orthopedic massage therapy practice a few blocks away. They sometimes take a little time to come, but they've gotten better in recent months. I can always rely on them to do the job right!

originalText.text: Does the job at a decent price with no hassles. All with a smile and pick up / delivery. What else can you ask for. Just hoping he's not another victim of the scorch earth policy on 9 Ave. Very few services or small shops left and lots of For Rent Signs. Plain greed..
